entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
